user.title: Select a Bluetooth device
user.description: Choose a Bluetooth device that Home Assistant can see to record its advertisement data. You can type to filter or paste a MAC address.

error.no_devices: No Bluetooth devices are currently visible. Make sure the device is advertising and try again.

add_rule.title: Add a parsing rule
add_rule.description: Define how to read bytes from the advertisement. The source key is required for manufacturer data (decimal or 0x hex) and service data (UUID).

edit_rule.title: Edit a parsing rule
edit_rule.description: Define how to read bytes from the advertisement. The source key is required for manufacturer data (decimal or 0x hex) and service data (UUID).

remove_rule.title: Remove a parsing rule
remove_rule.description: Choose a parsing rule to remove.
